Name: PowerBots RETRO
About the game: Battle robots to level up, team up with friends to beat bosses, or fight against players to get ahead! PowerBots Retro is a pixel art styled metroidvania made with fans of old school gaming in mind. This game is full of challenging levels and secret passages, with power-ups to help you reach new levels. It feels like playing popular titles from the 80's and early 90's, but with online chat and multiplayer gameplay!
